61 combat collisions were recorded during the day. In total, the enemy inflicted 7 rocket launchers and 61 aircraft strike, making 89 shelling of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In Kupyansk directionThe enemy of the offensive (assault) did not take action.

In the estuary directionOur soldiers repelled 8 enemy attacks in the area of the settlement of Terny, Donetsk oblast, where the enemy tried to break through the defenses of our troops.

In the Bakhmut directionOur warriors reflect 14 attacks in areas of settlements of Bigorivka of Luhansk region; Controversial, Ivano-Darjivka, Bogdanivka, Ivanivske, Khishchiyivka, the time of the Yar of Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to improve the tactical position.

In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders reflects 6 attacks in the areas of settlements of Berdychi, Pervomaisk Donetsk region, where the enemy tried to knock out our units from the occupied boundaries.

In the Novopavlovsky directionThe forces of defense continue to restrain the enemy in the areas of settlements of St. George, Novomikhailivka, Veliky Novosilka, a crop of Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried to break through the defense of our troops 18 times.

In the Orikhiv directionThe enemy, with the support of aviation, made 2 attacks on the positions of our defenders in the districts of Staromayorsky Donetsk region and northwestern Verbov Zaporizhzhya region.

In the Kherson directionDuring the day, the enemy had 1 attack of positions of our troops in the area of the settlement of Krynka of Kherson region.

Recall the epic destruction of the column of invaderscaused hysteriaAmong Russian propagandists.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense Forces in the Week4720 invaders were eliminatedand destroyed more than 200 units of armored vehicles.
title: The enemy comes in Bakhmut and Novopavlovsky directions: our soldiers repelled 32 attacks
